author: markt
msg: Try to write data in one large chunk.
Unexpected values for written are now observable.

author: desruisseaux
msg: - Removed asSubclassOrNull(...), which is not used widely enough.
- Changed return type of getAllInterfaces(Class) from Set<Class<?>> to Class<? super T>[]
- for consistency with other API (getLeafInterfaces(...), Class.getInterfaces())
- because Java arrays are covariant, while collections are not. See comment in source code.
- Renamed isAssignableTo(...) as isAssignableToAny(...) for better clarity.

author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-2676 DUCC webserver (WS) Services presentation improvements...support for modify instances, autostart
